message.body: Wow. Seems like u are happy !!
Pretty happy! Also I needed a koala love fest pick me up.
Leveraging a koala or two never hurts!
Ooh question what the hell does the acronym RACE mean in terms of emergency clinic procedures? I want to get that silly stuff signed off ASAP. Do you remember??

Rescue alarm contain evacuate. Google search can get u details
Oh so silly those things. Don't panic too much. As semester goes on supervisors sign more willingly. Jason? I didn't even waste my time getting him to sign clinical stuff if hes being an
no comment
Yeah Doreen will sign anything. Must make her feel like a movie star. That was totally mean!
The point where I cried was the point where I tried to get Jason to sign something. He told me why would I sign when I didn't know anything. Ok ouch.
Sorry to be mean about Doreen. I like her, she just gets so funny sometimes. I can tell that she is really trying hard though.
Classic Jason! U didn't respond, well I know you're an ass!"
IMO Doreen needs to get more patients in her own practice so she loosens up and realized the patients are not hers but the students and her job is to guide and teach not instruct or do.
The knife was that he actually said (among other things): you say you're a five element practitioner (tho actually I didn't say that) but you don't know anything about the five elements.
We're not her needle monkeys!
Oh brother...
Yeah I know exactly what you mean about Doreen.
I did totally stand up to Jason several times in a completely empirical way.
The older more experienced practitioners like Ben and Donna get it. Doreen has ways to go
Yeah I know that!
U are young in an acupuncture years way but that's why u are in school. He loves bashing the students but is afraid to actually teach an entire class
have fun in your second week of clinic!!!

My favorite Jason moment besides the dr tan hard on thing was when he snapped at me in front if a patient (just a first year student but still): why don't you know that? And I said: because I have been in practice for FOUR HOURS. Everyone started cracking
Thanks Bob. I think he has tried to teach but has been fired, right?
Lmao. Omg that's funny
I didn't know about him being fired. He has taught individual classes but not a class for an entire semester.
if the intent and beauty of clinic is to expand upon your didactic work then the clinic and pre clinic classes should complement ea other
Just my opinion...
He was doing clinical observation and told a girl if she wanted to understand phlegm she should go look in the mirror! WTF? They replaced him.
I'm not sure I understand the classes comment...
Wow.

My comment was essentially - if u are going to have advisors that practice certain style that varies so much from what is being taught in the classroom then Classes should adjusted or different supervisor
I know. I'm horrified. The first years are concerned that he will be their clinic supervisor after they got him fired. He's not a very nice person.
He needs to get more acupuncture
Supervisor not advisor. Sry
Good for u
Lol

Yes! Ok that's what I thought you meant. I actually love Jason's thinking and his txs but I wrote to him and was like, look I have not been trained like you at all and would like to understand the six great channels better but I need help.
Dude needles himself! A good argument against that practice! lol
He said he would talk to me about it this week. I think he has alot to offer but needs to not be a prick.
Fyi Some students would shadow him over lunch break in faculty clinic.
Agreed
Have gn! Me signing out
Yeah I think I'm gonna shadow him. Even tho it makes me shudder a little!
Thanks for talking,
Of course I will watch your video! And provide feedback. And of course I will not share it!!
53 of I mean.
Guess who completed 53 if 193 clinical competences in her first four shifts!!! :) :)
Holy crap! doing that many so fast - that's unheard of ! Overachiever!
And Ty for willingness to check out video. I know u r busy. Initial impression is what I'm really interested in. Don't wanna take lots of your time.
Have fun w your summer bf, Jason
Lets just exalt Jason to boyfriend status, just for the fun of it!
In his dreams!!
Aw that's sweet!
hope this sat is sooooo much better than the last for u
yuck - hopefully he's not.
If have to gather cara and perform an intervention if he was really ur bf
Hopefully dudes not actually dreaming of me though! lol
It will be I'm sure! Even if its not, that's ok. ☺❤
I didn't eat a lot. Apple. Granola bar. Water. baby carrots grapes etc. never really ate a meal like others

What did you eat during clinic? I am having trouble with that. I guess I just need to pack a Tupperware of food as I do for lunch but its hard to really eat and feels disrespectful to the patients somehow too.
Sweet Cara said she would punch him for me (tho she has never punched anyone before) so she would definitely participate in an intervention. Lol
go cara go!!!!

And yes I kind of agree re eating and disrespecting the clinic patients Etc. especially if eating in the space in the center. People chatting about non clinic stuff laughing Etc always annoyed me too. Patients can hear u fools!
Clinic was over at 7:30 but I just now got in the door with train schedule and feel sick from not eating.
I would definitely punch someone in the face for Cara if I had to!
Yeah I know. My classmates leave while needles are in to walk around the block smoke get soup or get coffee at Dunkin donuts. I don't like it!
Not my speed either
Trust ur instincts - good job
I can't imagine not remaining nearby in case someone needs you! Ok signing off to binge snack now! xoxo
A girls gotta eat and I don't have a lot of food prepared. Olives are amazing tho!!
In guessing u are w Annie. Ill wait for u
Wrong person I think!
Lol. Yep
Should I ask how day 4 of clinic was?
